rationale: The segment contains 'devastating', which describes the consequence of no safety net, not the virus itself with an intensifier.
statement_text: Scary thing is, as this [outbreak] grows, will that safety net be there all the time? And if it’s not [the safety net], it’s [the consequence of no safety net] going to be devastating.
